definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: But we must reject isolationism and its companion, protectionism. Retreating behind our borders would only invite danger.
sentences.chinese: 但是我們必須拒絕孤立主義及作爲其同伴的保護主義。

sentences.english: We must guard against and redress all forms of covert protectionist activities.
sentences.chinese: 要警惕和糾正形形色色的隱性保護主義行爲。

sentences.english: Another spike in unemployment could well set it loose.
sentences.chinese: 失業率的再次攀升可能會讓保護主義成爲脫繮之馬。

sentences.english: Zhan says protectionism is not a big deal at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 詹曉寧說，保護主義目前並不嚴重。

sentences.english: The second element is trade protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 第二個元素是貿易保護主義。

sentences.english: The remaining protectionist barriers only detract from those huge successes.
sentences.chinese: 殘存的保護主義壁壘只會損害這些卓著成果。

sentences.english: There is no room for parochialism or protectionism in our model of the future.
sentences.chinese: 在未來我們的模式中，沒有狹隘和保護主義。

sentences.english: On the Chinese side there have been moves towards protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 中國這邊已經有了針對保護主義的舉動。

sentences.english: "I don't believe that China engages in trade protectionism, " Wauquiez said.
sentences.chinese: 有人說中國在搞貿易保護主義，我不這樣認爲。

sentences.english: The report notes a general absence in projectionist policies despite the global economic recession.
sentences.chinese: 報告說，全球經濟陷入困境並未的貿易保護主義政策。

sentences.english: This kind of practice I think is a kind of trade protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲這種做法是一種貿易保護主義的做法。

sentences.english: Doing so might lead to retaliatory protectionism and a further hit to trade.
sentences.chinese: 這樣做可能導致保護主義的反擊，並進一步打擊貿易。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the function of trade protectionism of Euro-American anti-dumping act is reinforced.
sentences.chinese: 當代歐美反傾銷法的貿易保護主義功能越來越強。

sentences.english: Second, we should open markets further and oppose all forms of protectionism.
sentences.chinese: 第二，進一步開放市場，反對各種形式的保護主義。

sentences.english: In football, as elsewhere, protectionism merely coddles the mediocre.
sentences.chinese: 不論在足球，還是其他方面，保護主義只能培養庸才。

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4

definition: hawk faction (opposite: 鸽派, doves)/fierce and combative party/war party/warmongers
could happen at any moment/on the verge
the state of play in an election/the current state of a candidate's campaign
